detail_desc: Non-wired bralette in lace with lined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Wide shoulder straps and no fasteners.
All-in-one pyjamas in printed organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and long legs. Press studs down the front that continue down one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow, concealed elastication and a gently flared skirt with a wrapover front. Unlined.
Sports shorts in fast-drying jersey with contrasting colour trims, a wide, elasticated waistband and a print motif on the front.
Large imitation leather purse with a zip around the top, twelve card slots and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Size 2x10x19.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with short puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a text print, resort collar, classic front and straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
Knee-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Seam at the hem with a flared peplum. Unlined.
Jumper knitted in soft cotton with long sleeves, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in an airy viscose and cotton weave with a collar and V-neck opening at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an asymmetric seam with gathers at the waist for added width. Unlined.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, low  dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Blouse in a soft textured cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frill-trimmed cap sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in flock-print mesh with a frill-trimmed yoke at the front, short sleeves with a flounced trim, and a flounce at the hem. Sewn-in underdress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Shorts in stretch jersey with a denim look made from a cotton blend. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, a flounce with an overlocked edge at the top and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a round neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap front pockets with a button and side pockets. Covered elastication at the back of the hem.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with good air permeability to wick away moisture. Some of the polyester content of the tops is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved polo-neck jumper in a soft cable knit with a stocking stitched back and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a rounded hem.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with buttons at one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in a crinkled viscose weave with elastication around the top and decorative buttons down the front. Short sleeves with narrow elastication, and a rounded hem.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains, two with pendants. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Short jumper in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Slides with a wide foot strap in imitation suede and a metal buckle. Moulded insoles and chunky, fluted soles. The polyester content of the slides is partly recycled.
Cap in cotton twill with elastication at the back.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a flounce at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated seam with a decorative drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with gathered hems.

Rain coat in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined. The coat can be folded and packed easily into its storage bag which has an elasticated drawstring at the top. Size of bag 9x21 cm. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Fully lined, 5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and narrow hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of dungaree shorts in soft organic cotton. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1-4Y). Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket at the front and straps with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the front. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a stand-up collar and zip at the front. Zipped side pockets and a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Mesh lining.
Straight-cut coat in a textured weave made from a wool blend with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, diagonal front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Small suede shoulder bag with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener and a decorative metal buckle with sparkly stones. Detachable suede and metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 4x12x19 cm.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
High-waisted, ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a wide belt, hook-and-eye fasteners, zip fly, side pockets and tapered legs.

Wedge-heel sandals with a decorative knot detail at the front, an elasticated strap around the heel and braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 9 cm.

Studio Collection. Fitted jacket in a slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend with peak lapels and a one-button fastening at the front. Shoulder pads for a defined silhouette and long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Patch front pockets, one of which is a chest pocket, a gently tapered waist and a double back vent. Lined. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in a woven cotton blend with a ribbed collar and zip down the front. Straight cut with welt side pockets and long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.
Hat in a soft knit with ear flaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy denim with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Short skirt in imitation suede with a diagonal zip down the front and flap patch front pockets. Detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Lined.
Track jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Kangaroo pockets, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Leggings in stretch fabric, one pair in denim, and one pair in twill. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a fake fly.
Coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Detachable tie belt in imitation leather. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, button placket, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Long balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Sleeveless playsuit in jersey made from a viscose blend with decorative frills at the top and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
5-pocket denim jeans with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 1.8 cm.
Derby shoes in brogue-patterned imitation patent leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lightweight popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with a small peak at the front and a concealed elastic drawstring at the back, a zip at the top and a zipped front pocket. Long sleeves with ventilating holes under the arms and narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined. The popover jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in a textured organic cotton weave with an elasticated waist and adjustable straps that cross at the back.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit. High cut at the top, shoulder straps that cross at the back, and an open section at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length, straight-style tunic in a sturdy, wide-rib knit with a slight sheen. Collar and high slits in the sides.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom and a ribbed, turned-up hem. Cotton jersey lining.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Lined bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Short, two-strand necklace with one thin chain and one chunky anchor chain. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Long skirt woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication at the back of the waist and buttons down the front. Gathered seam at the hips and hem to create softly draping tiers.
Lace body with a V-neck and narrow, frill-trimmed shoulder straps with covered elastication at the back. Lined bust, high-cut legs, and press-studs at the crotch.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned viscose weave with covered elastication at the top and smocking front and back. Long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Frill trim at the top, hem and shoulders.
Long-sleeved, asymmetric dress in soft jersey with raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Fully lined, cropped vest top in sturdy jersey with visible seams. Racer back with a cut-out section, and wide elastication at the hem.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and tapered legs with elastication at the hems.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Boat-necked jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and narrow ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Wide jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dungarees in narrow-striped cotton corduroy with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps, a seam at the waist with wide elastication at the back, side pockets and tapered legs.
